Package org.kiji.rest.representations

Contains representation classes used for GETting/POSTing resources.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
EntityIdWrapper A simple wrapper class representing the return value of the GET method.
ExceptionWrapper Class that encapsulates the exception information to be sent back to the client (in JSON) so that it's both parseable by a JSON client as well as human readable in the browser.
GenericResourceRepresentation Class used to represent a generic resource that has a name and a corresponding URI used to access this resource.
KijiRestCell Models what a Kiji cell looks like when returned to the client.
KijiRestEntityId Container class for entity ids which can be backed as strings (suitable for raw, hashed, hash-prefixed, and materialization suppressed keys) xor as a list of components (suitable for formatted entity ids without materialization unsuppresed).
KijiRestRow Represents the Kiji row returned to the client.
SchemaOption Class that holds two (mutually exclusive) representations of an Avro schema.
 

Package org.kiji.rest.representations Description

Contains representation classes used for GETting/POSTing resources.
